main_definition: Pertaining to or happening every day, often in reference to routines, habits, or occurrences.

meanings_and_examples.example: She has a daily exercise routine that she follows religiously.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Regarding routines or habits performed every day
meanings_and_examples.example: Maintaining a daily meditation practice can greatly improve mental health.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to newspapers published once per day
meanings_and_examples.example: The local newspaper has three different editions: morning, noon, and evening, each considered as a separate 'daily' edition.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In reference to something that is required or recommended on a daily basis
meanings_and_examples.example: Taking vitamin C daily can help boost your immune system.
